help.title: Blackburn Buccaneer S2 - Observer
help.line: Approach speed (full flaps/aileron droop/tail flaps/airbrake): 145 kts IAS
To use the Back Seat View select a Buccaneer pilot in the
callsign you wish to link with. The other mulitplayer must
similarly select your multiplayer callsign to give you any control.
